name: Edge Of Eternity (Canceled)
blurb: Edge of Eternity is a Space J-RPG with an old school turn based combat system.

rewards.reward: Name in the credits\r\n============================== \r\nEvery tiers equal or above to 50$ now include your name in the credits, we will send you a survey at the end of the project to collect bakers information.
